Repost

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

A character wielding a weapon which is not "Heavy" may automatically counter attack after an opponent fails their attack. If the character's Speed * Swiftness of the Wind would have been sufficient to have make the attack fail, the defender rolls an attack outside their normal acting speed.

This speed uses the lowest of their Agility or Speed and the lower of their Swiftness of the Wind skill or the skill they would normally use for the attack.


The character can only use their full ranks in this skill if using Parry to defend.
If the character uses Block to defend they can use 3/4 their total ranks in this skill.
If the character uses Dodge to defend they can use 1/4 their total ranks in this skill.
